it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game.Board

  • Classes in it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game.Board used by it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game 
    Class and Description
    ActionSpace
    ActionSpace is a specific Box of the Game in which can be placed a FamilyMember.
    Board
    Board is a set of all the Region of the Game in which can be placed a FamilyMember.
    Deck
    Deck is a generic class which is used to modelize a deck of cards.
    PersonalBoard
    represent the personal bonus of the Player. a PersonalBoard contains all the card owned by the player cards: the DevelopmentCard owned by the player.
    PersonalBonusTile
    class representing the bonus tile of the player. bonus tiles are loaded from JSON external file, into which are detailed all the resoureces given by the activation of the harvest or the production bonus PersonalBonusTile.personalHarvestBonus: a ResourceSet representing the harvest bonus PersonalBonusTile.personalProductionBonus: a ResourceSet representing the production bonus PersonalBonusTile.flagGameRule: flag for the type of game rule: standard or advanced
  • Classes in it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game.Board used by it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game.Board 
    Class and Description
    ActionSpace
    ActionSpace is a specific Box of the Game in which can be placed a FamilyMember.
    CouncilRegion
    this class represent the council space CouncilRegion.councilSpace: the council region action space
    Deck
    Deck is a generic class which is used to modelize a deck of cards.
    HarvestRegion
    represent the HarvestRegion of the board into which can be placed a FamilyMember and performed an HarvestAction.
    MarketRegion
    represent the MarketRegion of the board
    ProductionRegion
    ProductionRegion is a specific Region of the Game into which can be placed a FamilyMember and performed a ProductionAction.
    Region
    represents a set of ActionSpace in which the Player can place its FamilyMember.
    TowerLayer
    TowerLayer is a specific level of a TowerRegion in which can be placed a FamilyMember and performed a TowerAction.
    TowerRegion
